oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Nashville Municipal Airport Interior, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior view of the "ultramodern" Nashville Municipal Airport. The new terminal provided many passenger services including a main lobby with seating for 200 people. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Municipal Airport
Capital City; Transportation; Airports
Nashville (Tenn.)
